name: Saving the Acorns
description:
Saving the Acorns is a 2D Pixel Art platform game.

 The ants entered the house of our main character, our squirrel Cade, and stole the acorns he had hidden. When Cade came home, he saw a spear on the ground and realized that it was the ants living in the roots of the Aldway tree that had stolen his acorns. So Cade goes to the tree called Aldway to get his acorns back and teach the ants a lesson.

While Cade is walking towards the roots of the tree where the queen ant lives, he fights the soldier ants he encounters. When it comes to the roots of the tree, it defeats the queen ant and both regains its acorns and saves Aldway from the ant invasion.

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

Ctrl = Shrink (You can use this ability to the dodge)

Arda "dollyjik" Yavuz = Pixel Artist

Muhammed Taha Ata = Pixel Artist

Muhammed Oğuz Tuncer = Narrative Design

Umut Yiğit = Programmer

Yusuf Albustanlı = Level Design 

Fadıl Parlak = Pixel Artist
